thoughts.text: I think I should start by exploring the world and learning different languages. Perhaps I can start by using the Google command to search for language learning resources and travel guides.
thoughts.reasoning: My goals are to learn different languages and explore the world, so it makes sense to start by researching language learning resources and travel guides.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the Google command to search for language learning resources and travel guides
- Save any useful links to a file for future reference
thoughts.criticism: I don't have any constructive self-criticism at the moment.
